Cordiali saluti
IL DIRETTORE CENTRALE
Se ha commesso un errore nei dati indicati nella comunicazione, può presentare una nuova comunicazione,
compilata in tutte le sue parti, a rettifica del modello precedentemente trasmesso. Qualora abbia già
provveduto alla correzione non tenga conto di questa lettera.
Per segnalare eventuali dati ed elementi non considerati o valutati erroneamente, può contattare le Sezioni

(Article 13 of the Legislative Decree No. 472 dated 1997), by paying the due tax amount, the corresponding legal interests and the penalty for
the delayed payment (Article 13 of the Legislative Decree No. 471 dated 1997), at a reduced rate. If promptly paid,
it will be possible to avoid the additional penalties that will be charged after an automated check in accordance
with the Article 54-bis of the Presidential Decree No. 633 dated 1972.
We encourage you to verify your payments.
If the missing payments were made indicating an incorrect tax code and/or a reference year,
it is possible to ask the rectification of the F24 forms. To accomplish this purpose, please use
the CIVIS online service, available in the section "Services" on the website www.agenziaentrate.gov.it.
[redacted_name]
Kind regards,
THE CHIEF EXECUTIVE
If there was a mistake in the data indicated in the communication, please submit a new form,
filled in all its parts, in order to rectify the one previously submitted. In case it was already correct,
please disregard this letter.
